title: You're Too Early Modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user taps on a game tile from the Watch tab (Watch Now or Games segments)
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The game has not yet been moved to LIVE or MEDIA_ON (No feeds available)

EX: Future time, date
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will observe a modal that states, "You're a bit too early", and copy underneath which reads, â€œThere are no feeds available. Please come back later to tune in."

title: Game Launch Modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user taps on a game tile from the Watch tab (Watch Now or Games segments)
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The game is not available for the user at the moment when it is launched

OR

+ Broadcasts for a live game are available to launch
custom_expected:
THEN

+ A modal is displayed for the user with an error message or watch options 

AND

+ If on an iPad, the modal will be centered on the screen

OR

+ If on an iPhone, the modal will display as a bottom sheet on screen

title: No Feeds Available Modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a game with no feeds available
AND the game is in progress or the game is final
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the game
custom_expected: THEN the No Feeds Available Modal is displayed

title: Partner Message Modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A user that is signed in or out of the app has navigated to the Watch tab
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user taps on a game tile from the Games segment or Watch Now segment 

AND

+ The game is being streamed by a third-party partner app
custom_expected:
THEN

+ A modal will display with the copy, "This exclusive MLB broadcast is available for Free in HD on [partner name]"

AND

+ There is a button which allows users to deeplink into the partner app

AND

+ An option to Listen on MLB At Bat which deeplinks the user to the Audio-Only EPG

AND

+ An option to Follow in Gameday which sends the user to that game's Gameday page.

title: Blackout Message Modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is attempting to watch a game of a team located within a broadcast blackout area
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Receiving a Content Blacked Out modal at launch
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will observe the two team logos
+ Content Blacked Out header copy
+ Copy explaining the game being unavailable in their area
+ Blackout restrictions copy, with archive and playback information. 
+ An OK button to navigate out of the modal

title: Has Media + Blacked Out + In Market Entitlemenets Needed
custom_steps: WHEN Game has Media AND Blacked Out and In Market Entitlements needed
custom_expected: THEN show In Market Entitlements Needed Dialog

title: Subscription Required Modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is attempting to launch a game that has additional entitlements required to receive playback (Example: Postseason games will require TV provider MVPD entitlement)
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Selecting a postseason game or all-star game that will launch the Authentication modal
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will observe the two team logos
+ An Additional Authentication Required header copy
+ Copy which reads, "Eligible MLB.TV subscribers must receive [network] through a participating Pay TV provider to watch the [Event] LIVE in the U.S. Authentication is required. To link your MLB.tv account to a participating pay TV provider, visit MLB.tv/postseason. Live audio and full game archives are available with a valid MLB.tv subscription 90 minutes after the conclusion of the game."
+ An OK button to navigate out of the modal view

title: Partner Logo Sizing
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user taps on a partner broadcasted game tile from the Watch tab (Watch Now or Games segments) 

EX: ESPN+, APPLETV+, SN, FOX, GOTHAM SPORTS
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Observing the partner logo displayed on the feed modal
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The logo will be the appropriate size

AND

+ The logo is not overlapping any copy 

AND

+ The expected logo is displayed

title: Free Game Of The Day Modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A free game of the day is listed on the calendar

AND

+ The user is not logged into the MLB app
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user selects the Free Game of the Day from various launch points of the app such as Watch, Home, Scores, and Gameday EPG
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will receive a login modal where they can input their credentials in order to receive video playback (Can be a free account)

title: Pregame + Media Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is logged into an entitled account with access to MLB.tv playback
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ A game in the pregame state is launched from Watch, Scores, Home, and Gameday
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will be immediately navigated into video playback

title: In-Progress + Media Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is logged into an entitled account with access to MLB.tv playback
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ A live game that is in progress is launched from Watch, Scores, Home, and Gameday
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will be immediately navigated into video playback

AND

+ Playback begins at the live point (Hide Scores disabled)

title: FGOTD + Free User Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is logged into a free account without entitlements
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Launching the free game of the day from Watch, Scores, Home, or Gameday
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user is immediately navigated into the video player with successful playback
